short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts all URLs from your sitemap and flags those with 2xx, 3xx, 4xx, and 5xx status codes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sitemap URL Status Checker 
Easily verify the health of your website's links! This Chrome extension extracts all URLs from your sitemap and checks their HTTP status codes (2xx, 3xx, 4xx, 5xx). It provides color-coded results for quick identification of link issues and allows you to export problematic URLs in CSV or XML format. Perfect for web developers, SEO specialists, and digital marketers to ensure a seamless user experience and optimal search engine performance.
